Apart from downstream leased assets, we also 
recognise business travel as a material source of Scope 3 GHG emissions
The global nature of our business and the location of our offices (i.e. no alternative other than flying to travel internationally) mean some business travel is critical to our business
However, by working with our travel partners, we aim to optimise each trip and minimise our impact on the environment. As a result, our overall CO2e emissions attributed to staff (including both employees and contractors travelling on business for AerCap) were reduced by 17% in 2019
